title: HitTheLow
author: HitTheLow
content: Hello everyone,a new star is born in crypto, Hashflow is the next big thing. Let's talk about HFThttps://www.hashflow.com/https://www.binance.com/en/trade/HFT_USDT?theme=dark&type=spotWelcome to the HashVerse

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: HitTheLow on February 19, 2023, 09:14:00 PMa new star is born in crypto, Hashflow is the next big thing. Already pumped 3x in 40 days. Would be nice to wait for a decent correction but yea it can pump far higher from current price because of CEX FUD, crosschain swaps and growing popularity.The few things that bother me is that:1- only 20% of supply is in circulation2- only ~15 mln $ daily volume compared to 230 mln$ on pancakeswap. If we do a volume/marketcap calulation CAKE looks more than twice better.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Ok lets talk. Lets start by not using 1h charts but zoom out a little. I've never even heard about this token, but i am intrigued and so confused. What the hell even is this? A Dex a part of some game? How does the dex have a fiat ramp planned in the roadmap?What makes me even more intrigued is that Binance believes in these by listing them and they do research for fundamentals, or at least they should do some

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on February 22, 2023, 06:54:31 PMOk lets talk. Lets start by not using 1h charts but zoom out a little. Its hard to do any TA based on chart that is less than 4 months long. No matter what time frame you chose.Quote from: o48o on February 22, 2023, 06:54:31 PMI've never even heard about this token, but i am intrigued and so confused. What the hell even is this? A Dex a part of some game? So maybe you should start with a research and then post your thoughts/concerns instead of sayint "what the hell even is this?".Quote from: o48o on February 22, 2023, 06:54:31 PMBinance believes in these by listingHFT was a most recent binance lauchpool.
